评论详情: This rock punk hobo handbag is both stylish and functional. The design is edgy and unique, making it a standout accessory for any outfit. I have really enjoyed wearing it.

It is a nice style purse and very useful. The leather look is nice too. Goes well with casual clothing. My daughter liked it and said it was a good purse. Not my style but definitely a nice style for her.

This women’s hobo handbag is functional and practical. The shoulder strap is adjustable and provides a comfortable carry. The bag has a decent amount of space and is suitable for everyday use. The design is straightforward, and the material is average. It serves its purpose but doesn’t stand out in terms of style or durability. Overall, it’s a reasonable choice for a basic handbag.

Large and pockets/compartments everywhere!  This is made out of a pleather/faux leather-type material. It did have an odor upon arrival but after sitting out for a while it went away. A LOT of pockets and the main compartment can hold a kindle, phone, makeup bag, wallet, water bottle and MORE! The outside buckle strap for decor give it a very elevated look. The shoulder strap is adjustable and the 2 outside pockets are everything! lol  SO happy with this purse!  ]
I really love the appearance of this purse. I like the pockets in it. You can tell it's made of quality material. The color is excellent and it's got a nice size to it. I'm very happy with it

THIS IS THE PERFECT SIZE....MY "GO TO" CLUTCH FITS INSIDE, AS WELL AS ALL OF MY OTHER NORMAL PURSE ITEMS, BUT IT'S NOT HUGE WITH A TON OF EXTRA WASTED SPACE. IT'S STYLISH AND VERSATILE WITH BEING ABLE TO ADJUST THE STRAP LENGTH TO MAKE IT INTO A CROSSBODY. I WASN'T SURE IF I WOULD LIKE IT IN PERSON OR NOT, BUT WHEN I OPENED IT UP, I REALLY AM ENJOYING IT. THE PRICE IS JUST WHAT I WOULD EXPECT FOR THE QUALITY, TOO.

This is a pretty nice fashion handbag/ purse and it's on diverse way. I had a nice size capacity overall and the zippers were modest and functional which is always a great thing. I would say that it has a really nice texture and it kind of brings a sense of silkiness comfort but at the same time it has a very odd material feel to it that lets you know that it might not last very long. Now I could be wrong unless I put it through a lot of wear and tear just in case but if it's for fashion mostly I'm wearing with an outfit or going out for the afternoon, it shouldn't be that heavy with stuff in your purse but if you're anything like me in between I like to add like many women do, a lot of things to my purse even if it's for the day or so, I just feel like it needs more security overall and the material of how the bag feels sustainably but at least the inside feels secure, don't put any sharp objects even if it's a pen because I feel as though it might go through. Other than that it is a beautiful color and it does have a nice bold statement to your fashion repertoire so that's always awesome, thank you!

I am usually not a fan of the slouch purse, but this design looks great. Plenty of space and pockets. The material is sturdy, but actually soft to the touch. Overall, this slouch is no slouch and I am very satisfied.

I love this purse! It is large and roomy. Even larger than I thought. The bands with the eyeholes add that cool touch. I had been wishing to have a purse like this. The strap is adjustable with the nice big buckles. There are two loops to hold the strap's extra length on the side. There are two zippers on the main purse opening. The two side pockets are nice and add a neat touch. The material is shiny and it is a bit slippery. It seems to be well made. It looks so nice!! I like to wear my larger purse and bags in a crossbody fashion, and the strap is long enough to do that. The end of the decorative band that goes around the front of the bag was curling out a bit, but I straightened it and clipped it to the band under it with a binder clip and left it on overnight and that did the trick for now.
